article_title: Apple's Next Big Focus: Your Health
article_text:
Apple Inc. has jolted many industries over the years, from recorded music to mobile phones. Now, it is charging into health and fitness, hoping to bring order to a fragmented mess of wearable devices and scattered data.

Its entry is stirring enthusiasm among entrepreneurs and health providers. But Apple will have to overcome regulatory and...
